Record.ClassificationPath: Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Disease or Disorder/Syndrome/Respiratory Distress Syndrome/Neonatal Respiratory Distress Syndrome,/NCIThesaurus/Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Disease or Disorder/Disorder by Site/Respiratory and Thoracic Disorder/Thoracic Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Thoracic Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Lung Disorder/Hyaline Membrane Syndrome/Neonatal Respiratory Distress Syndrome
Record.Synonym: RDS, respiratory distress syndrome of newborns
Record.Description: A condition of the newborn marked by dyspnea with cyanosis, most frequently occurring in premature infants, children of diabetic mothers and infants delivered by cesarean section, and sometimes with no predisposing cause.
